hero.title: Technology driven lead generation
hero.text: Sell and market more effectively with technographic insights. We track over a thousand technologies accross websites of millions of companies to help you to identify new prospects and increase your addressable market.

lookup.title: Technology lookup
lookup.subtitle: Find out what websites are built with
lookup.text: Instantly reveal the technology stack and contact details of any website.

lists.title: Lead lists
lists.subtitle: Create lists of websites that use certain technologies
lists.text: Find new customers and prospects based on the technologies they use. Lead lists are an essential tool for market research and competitor analysis and provide valuable technographic insights.
features: Organic data with traffic markers and contacts

bulk.title: Bulk lookup
bulk.subtitle: Look up a number of websites in one go
bulk.text: Supply your own list of websites to create a report of the technologies they use, along with contact details and metadata. Gain a better understanding of your target audience with technographic insights.
features: Perform up to 5,000 lookups at once

apis.title: APIs
apis.subtitle: Programmatic access to technographic data
apis.text: The Wappalyzer APIs provide instant access to website technology stacks and meta data. Track your prospects' technology choices, examine large numbers of websites or enrich your own datasets.

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.subtitle: Get notified when a website's technology stack changes
alerts.text: Monitor your competitor's technology choices with alerts. Be the first to know when they move to a new CMS, ecommerce platform or any other technology.

download.title: Browser extension
download.subtitle: Get the free browser extension
download.text: Install the Wappalyzer browser extension to see the technologies used on websites you visit at a glance.
features: Available on Chrome, Firefox and Edge

pricing.title: Plans & pricing
pricing.text: Sign up for access to our full range of products. Each plan grants you monthly credits to spend on technology lookups, lead lists and API calls.
